feed.title: One on One
feed.subtitle: One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast, specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.title: Spider Scores 71, Nets Cruising, Hawks and Twolves Dysfunction, Lebron Approaching Scoring Record - Season 2 Episode 11

link.title: Spider Scores 71, Nets Cruising, Hawks and Twolves Dysfunction, Lebron Approaching Scoring Record - Season 2 Episode 11

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah return for their first show of 2023 as the NBA season continues on into the new year. They discuss Donovan Mitchell scoring a Cavalier record 71 points as well as the other historic stat lines from other players we’ve seen recently. They also talk about the Nets and their recent stretch of dominance, in addition to the issues in Atlanta and Minnesota. And finally, they discuss LeBron’s scoring binge and when he might officially pass Kareem’s record.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Suns Sold, Bulls Drama, Knicks Red Hot, Superstar Injuries, MVP Poll and Early NBA All-Star Predictions - Season 2 Episode 10

link.title: Suns Sold, Bulls Drama, Knicks Red Hot, Superstar Injuries, MVP Poll and Early NBA All-Star Predictions - Season 2 Episode 10

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss the Phoenix Suns being sold, the Chicago Bulls star Zach Lavine unhappy, New York Knicks winners of seven straight, Steph Curry and Anthony Davis injuries, plus the boys discuss ESPN first MVP poll of the season, and they give their early All-Star predictions.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Pelicans Atop the West and Suns Struggle, East Disappointments in Miami and Chicago, Warriors/Celtics Recap, and Paul Silas - Season 2 Episode 9

link.title: Pelicans Atop the West and Suns Struggle, East Disappointments in Miami and Chicago, Warriors/Celtics Recap, and Paul Silas - Season 2 Episode 9

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah are back with longtime friend of the show, Lucas Jafet, and they discuss the Pelicans recent hot streak, as well as some teams that are currently underperforming, plus they give their thoughts on the Warriors/Celtics rematch, and discuss the passing of former NBA player and Coach Paul Silas.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: Bucks and Celtics Dominate the League, Anthony Davis in the MVP Conversation, Trae Young Unhappy with Hawks Head Coach, and Lebron Teammates Draft - Season 2 Episode 8

link.title: Bucks and Celtics Dominate the League, Anthony Davis in the MVP Conversation, Trae Young Unhappy with Hawks Head Coach, and Lebron Teammates Draft - Season 2 Episode 8

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss the incredible start to the season that the Milwaukee Bucks and Boston Celtics are having. They also discuss how well Anthony Davis has played as of late, as well as whether Trae Young being unhappy is cause for concern, plus the guys draft some of Lebron’s best teammates and debate which team he’d rather play for.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: Lakers Blow Lead, Mavs’ Struggles Continue, the Tank Race Is On, and Should This Player’s Jersey Be Retired? - Season 2 Episode 7

link.title: Lakers Blow Lead, Mavs’ Struggles Continue, the Tank Race Is On, and Should This Player’s Jersey Be Retired? - Season 2 Episode 7

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss the Lakers brutal collapse against the Pacers, the Dallas Mavericks’ struggles as well as Kemba Walker signing, the NBA race for the #1 overall draft pick, and should certain NBA players get their number retired?

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: Blazers and Kings Surprise, Both LA Teams Continue Up and Down Seasons, and Ben Simmons Returns to Philly! - Season 2 Episode 6

link.title: Blazers and Kings Surprise, Both LA Teams Continue Up and Down Seasons, and Ben Simmons Returns to Philly! - Season 2 Episode 6

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss the surprising start of the season for the Portland Trailblazers and Sacramento Kings. They also discuss both LA teams and what Anthony Davis and Kawhi Leonard need to do to help their teams, plus Ben Simmons returns to Philadelphia for the first time since being traded.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: Embiid and Garland Dominate, Warriors and Knicks Struggles, and Most Improved Player Award Favorites - Season 2 Episode 5

link.title: Embiid and Garland Dominate, Warriors and Knicks Struggles, and Most Improved Player Award Favorites - Season 2 Episode 5

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss some impressive performances by Joel Embiid and Darius Garland, the recent struggles and what needs to change for the Warriors and Knicks, plus who they think should be the favorites for the most improved player award!

entry.title: Kyrie Irving Requirements, Nets Next Head Coach, Timberwolves Troubles, Cleveland and Utah Red Hot Start!! - Season 2 Episode 4

link.title: Kyrie Irving Requirements, Nets Next Head Coach, Timberwolves Troubles, Cleveland and Utah Red Hot Start!! - Season 2 Episode 4

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss what Kyrie Irving has to do in order to get back on the court, as well what the Minnesota Timberwolves need to do to get back on track, and what’s been the key to the Cavs and Jazz strong start to the season.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: BREAKING: Nets Fire Nash, Set to Hire Udoka!!! - Season 2 Episode 3

link.title: BREAKING: Nets Fire Nash, Set to Hire Udoka!!! - Season 2 Episode 3

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss the breaking news that the Brooklyn Nets fired head coach Steve Nash and are set to hire former Celtics coach Ime Udoka.
